overview: Clean-cut lawyer Jake Large is about to find out the meaning of pain. After intervening a mugging to save the life of a young woman, he falls desperately in love with her. But exotic dancer Candice isn't entirely what she seems... Will he uncover her murderous plot before it's too late? An erotic tale of lust and vengeance, Lady Terror will thrill you until the very end.
tagline: A lawyer in the middle of a partner separation, becomes entangled in a murder plot by a complete stranger.
title: Lady Terror
